com.sadakatsu.clue.cards
Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
  com.sadakatsu.clue.cards.Suggestion

public class Suggestion
extends java.lang.Object

The Suggestion class represents three important and similar Clue concepts: solution, suggestion, and accusation. The purpose of Clue is to determine who killed Mr. Boddy with what and where. This is a tuple of Suspect, Weapon, and Room. The game's solution, the suggestions the players make each turn, and the accusations raised when players try to win all have this same structure. Since suggestions are the most commonly referenced concept when playing Clue, "Suggestion" was chosen as the name for the structure for all three.

Author:
Joseph A. Craig

Suggestion

public Suggestion(java.lang.String from)
           throws InvalidSuggestionString
Builds a Suggestion from a server-player-style message, which has the format "Su We Ro". This is the format for a Suggestion abbreviation.
